title: Authors and Citation
text: Fernandez S, De Pooter D (2024). eurobis: Download data EurOBIS using LifeWatch/EMODnet-Biology Web Feature Services. R package version 0.0.0.9000,  https://lifewatch.github.io/eurobis/, https://github.com/lifewatch/eurobis.
code: @Manual{,   title = {eurobis: Download data from EurOBIS using the LifeWatch/EMODnet-Biology Web Feature Services},   author = {Salvador Fernandez and Daphnis {De Pooter}},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000,  https://lifewatch.github.io/eurobis/},   url = {https://github.com/lifewatch/eurobis}, }

what: Download data from EurOBIS using the LifeWatch/EMODnet-Biology Web Feature Services
title: Download data from EurOBIS using the LifeWatch/EMODnet-Biology Web Feature Services
text: eurobis R package allows download data EurOBIS. can query : Dataset: provide Integrated Marine Information System (IMIS) unique identifier datasets DasID. Taxon: use scientific name (e.g. sea turtle Caretta caretta) WoRMS AphiaID (e.g. 137205) Traits: get occurrences benthos. zooplankton. . Powered WoRMS. Time: just give start end dates. Geographically: allows query 300 records Marine Regions Gazetteer giving MRGID. just pass area interest polygon written Well Known Text important classifications IUCN Red List, MSDF Indicators Habitats Directive CITES Annexes. create selection using EMODnet Biology toolbox. Just copy webservice URL paste R.

title: Download data from EurOBIS using the LifeWatch/EMODnet-Biology Web Feature Services
text: can install development version GitHub devtools:

title: Download data from EurOBIS using the LifeWatch/EMODnet-Biology Web Feature Services
text: Use eurobis_occurrences() family functions query data. basic example : detailed information run:
code: library(eurobis)  # Get one single dataset eurobis_occurrences_basic(dasid = 8045) #> Loading ISO 19139 XML schemas... #> Loading ISO 19115 codelists... #> Loading IANA mime types... #> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8. #> ✔ Downloading layer: EMODnet EurOBIS Basic Occurrence Data #> ℹ The Basic Occurrence Data download provides you data for the following 8 essential terms: datasetid, datecollected, decimallongitude, decimallatitude, coordinateuncertaintyinmeters, scientificname, aphiaid, scientificnameaccepted. For more information, please consult: https://www.emodnet-biology.eu/emodnet-data-format. #> Simple feature collection with 52 features and 10 fields #> Geometry type: POINT #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: -8.73964 ymin: 40.61773 xmax: -8.73902 ymax: 40.61899 #> CRS:           EPSG:4326 #> # A tibble: 52 × 11 #>    gml_id         id datas…¹ datecollected       decim…² decim…³ coord…⁴ scien…⁵ #>  * <fct>       <int> <chr>   <dttm>                <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl> <chr>   #>  1 eurobis-o… 3.68e7 https:… 2020-05-05 00:00:00   -8.74    40.6       5 Zoster… #>  2 eurobis-o… 3.68e7 https:… 2019-12-13 00:00:00   -8.74    40.6       5 Zoster… #>  3 eurobis-o… 3.68e7 https:… 2020-03-03 00:00:00   -8.74    40.6       5 Zoster… #>  4 eurobis-o… 3.68e7 https:… 2019-12-13 00:00:00   -8.74    40.6       5 Zoster… #>  5 eurobis-o… 3.68e7 https:… 2020-08-10 00:00:00   -8.74    40.6       5 Zoster… #>  6 eurobis-o… 3.68e7 https:… 2020-08-10 00:00:00   -8.74    40.6       5 Zoster… #>  7 eurobis-o… 3.68e7 https:… 2020-05-05 00:00:00   -8.74    40.6       5 Zoster… #>  8 eurobis-o… 3.68e7 https:… 2020-05-05 00:00:00   -8.74    40.6       5 Zoster… #>  9 eurobis-o… 3.68e7 https:… 2020-03-03 00:00:00   -8.74    40.6       5 Zoster… #> 10 eurobis-o… 3.68e7 https:… 2020-05-05 00:00:00   -8.74    40.6       5 Zoster… #> # … with 42 more rows, 3 more variables: aphiaid <chr>, #> #   scientificnameaccepted <chr>, geometry <POINT [°]>, and abbreviated #> #   variable names ¹​datasetid, ²​decimallongitude, ³​decimallatitude, #> #   ⁴​coordinateuncertaintyinmeters, ⁵​scientificname help(eurobis_occurrences)

title: Download data from EurOBIS using the LifeWatch/EMODnet-Biology Web Feature Services
text: can also filter location, either using Marine Regions Gazetteer Identifier (MRGID) passing polygon Well Known Text. help drawing area interest, can use eurobis_map_draw(). can draw polygon interactively: help choosing MRGID Marine Regions, see list queriable regions MRGIDs family functions eurobis_map_regions_*: open leaflet map including layers, read via Web Map Services (WMS). See manual : Note passing MRGID geometry restrict selected area within MRGID record, adds data fetched selected data MRGID record.
code: eurobis_occurrences_basic(mrgid = 5688, geometry = "POLYGON ((-9.099426 40.33016, -9.099426 40.9788, -8.366089 40.9788, -8.366089 40.33016, -9.099426 40.33016))") selected_area <- eurobis_map_draw() #> POLYGON ((-9.099426 40.33016, -9.099426 40.9788, -8.366089 40.9788, -8.366089 40.33016, -9.099426 40.33016))  eurobis_occurrences_full(geometry = selected_area) # MEOW Ecoregions eurobis_map_regions_ecoregions()  # Exclusive Economic Zones (EEZ) eurobis_map_regions_eez()  # International Hydrographic Office areas (IHO) eurobis_map_regions_iho()  # Marine Regions intersection of EEZ and IHO. Named as Marine Region in eurobis_list_regions() eurobis_map_regions_eez_iho()  # EMODnet-Biology Reporting Areas eurobis_map_regions_reportingareas() help(eurobis_map_regions)

what: Why an EurOBIS R package? Didn’t exist an OBIS package already?
title: Download data from EurOBIS using the LifeWatch/EMODnet-Biology Web Feature Services
text: Yes, also use OBIS R package robis. main advantage eurobis R package functionality query species traits.

title: Download data from EurOBIS using the LifeWatch/EMODnet-Biology Web Feature Services
text: data extracted EMODnet Biology secondary analysis resulting publication, appropriate source cited. downloaded data cited : EMODnet Biology (yyyy) Fulll Occurrence Data parameters downloaded EMODnet Biology Project (www.emodnet-biology.eu). Available online www.emodnet-biology.eu/toolbox, consulted yyyy-mm-dd. Regarding citation individual datasets, following guidelines taken account: individual data source EurOBIS constitutes significant proportion downloaded used records (e.g. 10% data derived single source), individual data source also cited. individual data source EurOBIS constitutes substantial proportion downloaded used records (e.g. 25% data derived single source data essential arrive conclusion analysis), manager custodian data set contacted. case, may useful contact data custodian directly. data custodian might additional data available may strengthen analysis /might able provide additional helpful information may apparent provided metadata. data may redistributed without permission appropriate data owners. data extracted EMODnet Data Portal redistribution, please contact us bio@emodnet.eu.

List EurOBIS datasets — eurobis_list_datasets

title: List EurOBIS datasets — eurobis_list_datasets
List EurOBIS datasets — eurobis_list_datasets
text: tibble dataset ID dataset title can queried  eurobis package. See details section.

title: List EurOBIS datasets — eurobis_list_datasets
text: datasets EurOBIS documented Integrated Marine Information System (IMIS) want get information dataset, can look dataset  https://www.vliz./en/imis?module=dataset. Note can pass dataset ID url. e.g:  https://www.vliz./en/imis?module=dataset&dasid=216 prefer machine-readable format, add `&show=json` https://www.vliz./en/imis?module=dataset&dasid=216&show=json can read easily R, e.g: jsonlite::fromJSON("https://www.vliz./en/imis?module=dataset&dasid=216&show=json")

title: List Marine Regions — eurobis_list_regions
text: List Marine Regions

title: List Marine Regions — eurobis_list_regions
List Marine Regions — eurobis_list_regions
text: tibble Marine Regions names unique identifier MRGID. See details section.

title: List Marine Regions — eurobis_list_regions
text: Marine Regions Gazetteer geographical backbone EurOBIS. MRGID Marine Regions Gazetteer Unique Identifier. persistent ID ever deleted.  See https://marineregions.org/mrgid.php information. can find info marine region searching Marine Regions website:  https://marineregions.org/gazetteer.php?p=search can use mregion2 R package:  https://github.com/lifewatch/mregions2 E.g.: library(mregions2) gaz_search(25600)

title: Interactive map with the regions on your viewer. Click to get the MRGID and more info — eurobis_map_regions
text: select specific layer provide code layer. alternatively,  use helper layer: - eurobis_map_regions_ecoregions() = Marine Ecoregions World (MEOW) - eurobis_map_regions_eez() = International Hydrographic Office Sea Areas (IHO) - eurobis_map_regions_iho() = Exclusive Economic Zones (EEZ) - eurobis_map_regions_eez_iho() = Intersections IHO EEZ - eurobis_map_regions_reportingareas() = EMODnet Biology Reporting Areas Marine Regions https://marineregions.org/ geographical backbone EurOBIS.  regions included Marine Regions Gazetteer. can see full list regions  eurobis_list_regions(). can find info layers https://marineregions.org/sources.php EMODnet Biology Reporting Areas described . EMODnet Reporting Areas modified  MSDF European seas (https://www.eea.europa.eu/data--maps/data/europe-seas-1) fit  purpose reporting EMODnet project. info  : https://marineregions.org/gazetteer.php?p=details&id=63392

code: if (FALSE) { eurobis_name2id(c("Abra alba", "Engraulis encrasicolus")) eurobis_name2id(c("foo")) eurobis_name2id(1) eurobis_name2id("") eurobis_name2id(c("Abra alba", "foo", NA)) eurobis_name2id(c("Abra alba", "Engraulis encrasicolus")) eurobis_name2id(c("abra alba", "foo foo2", "caballo loco")) }

what: Get EurOBIS data by using the EMODnet-Biology webservices — eurobis_occurrences
title: Get EurOBIS data by using the EMODnet-Biology webservices — eurobis_occurrences
text: Get EurOBIS data using EMODnet-Biology webservices

title: Get EurOBIS data by using the EMODnet-Biology webservices — eurobis_occurrences
code: eurobis_occurrences(   type,   url = NULL,   mrgid = NULL,   geometry = NULL,   dasid = NULL,   start_date = NULL,   end_date = NULL,   aphiaid = NULL,   scientific_name = NULL,   functional_groups = NULL,   cites = NULL,   habitats_directive = NULL,   iucn_red_list = NULL,   msdf_indicators = NULL,   paging = FALSE,   paging_length = 50000,   verbose = TRUE,   ... )  eurobis_occurrences_basic(...)  eurobis_occurrences_full(...)  eurobis_occurrences_full_and_parameters(...)  eurobis_occurrences_count(...)

title: Get EurOBIS data by using the EMODnet-Biology webservices — eurobis_occurrences
text: type Type data, one c('basic', 'full', 'full_and_parameters').  can use one wrappers: - eurobis_occurrences_basic - eurobis_occurrences_full - eurobis_occurrences_full_and_parameters info : https://www.emodnet-biology.eu/emodnet-data-format can also see number occurrences query return performing request : - eurobis_occurrences_count See details information. url WFS request copied LifeWatch/EMODnet-Biology Download Toolbox. Use eurobis_download_toolbox mrgid Marine Regions Gazetteer unique identifier. See list available regions eurobis_list_regions  visualize eurobis_map_regions geometry WKT geometry string sf object region interest. can draw polygon interactively  eurobis_map_draw dasid IMIS dataset unique identifier. See list available datasets eurobis_list_datasets start_date Start date occurrences. Format YYYY-MM-DD. end_date End date occurrences. Format YYYY-MM-DD. aphiaid WoRMS taxon unique identifier. See https://www.marinespecies.org/ https://docs.ropensci.org/worrms/ scientific_name Taxon name. matched WoRMS fly. Ignored aphiaid provided. functional_groups Functional groups available WoRMS: See eurobis::species_traits. cites CITES Annex. See eurobis::species_traits. habitats_directive Habitats Directive Annex. See eurobis::species_traits. iucn_red_list IUCN Red List Category. See eurobis::species_traits. msdf_indicators Marine Strategy Directive Framework indicators. See eurobis::species_traits. paging TRUE, data requested chunks. Use large requests. See details. paging_length Size chunks number rows. Default 50K. See details. verbose set FALSE hide info messages ... parameters pass  ows4R get feature request (e.g. cql_filter parallel)

title: Get EurOBIS data by using the EMODnet-Biology webservices — eurobis_occurrences
text: tibble sf object eurobis data

title: Get EurOBIS data by using the EMODnet-Biology webservices — eurobis_occurrences
text: want perform large request, likely take long time complete even  work . case, best approach first check number occurrences returned  query eurobis_occurrences_count. number high (e.g. 500K), can set paging = TRUE download data smaller chunks.  still take time, less likely break service using several small request one large one. can set size data chunk  paging_length. largest chunk, faster download  data, also likely break service.

title: Get EurOBIS data by using the EMODnet-Biology webservices — eurobis_occurrences
code: if (FALSE) { # Get dataset with ID 8045 # See also ?eurobis_list_datasets test <- eurobis_occurrences_basic(dasid = 8045)  # Get full dataset with ID 8045 test <- eurobis_occurrences_full(dasid = 8045)  # Get full dataset with ID 8045 including extra measurements or facts  test <- eurobis_occurrences_full_and_paremeters(dasid = 8045)  # Get occurrences from Zostera marina in the ecoregion Alboran Sea (MRGID 21897) # See also ?eurobis_list_regions test <- eurobis_occurrences_full(mrgid = 21897, scientific_name = "Zostera marina")  # Get zooplankton occurrences from the region of your choice # See ?eurobis_map_mr and ?eurobis::species_traits my_area <- eurobis_map_draw() test <- eurobis_occurrences_basic(geometry = my_area, functional_groups = "zooplankton")  # Get occurrences from the Continuous Plankton Recorder (dataset id 216) in January 2016 test <- eurobis_occurrences_basic(dasid = 216, start_date = "2016-01-01", end_date = "2016-01-31") }
